description:
****** NOW INCLUDES MULTI-TOUCH AND AUTOMATIC FLIP *******

Do your children enjoy making a scene?

Then give them 'Make a Scene', and give yourself some precious peace and quiet. 

Make A Scene Jungle is a fun interactive game that engages children’s natural sense of creativity. It is aimed primarily at pre-school age children, but will provide hours of entertainment for children (and adults!) of all ages. Helping to develop vocabulary, fine motor skills, co-ordination and creative thinking, Make A Scene offers a great way for your child to play and learn at the same time.

Make A Scene Jungle uses drag and drop interactions, descriptive audio, real life sound effects and engaging animations to create an entertaining, educational platform. Children will have endless fun using their imagination to create their very own jungle scenes.

The game features typical items found in a jungle, such as animals, people, plants and flowers. By dragging and dropping these digital, animated ‘stickers’ onto the different backgrounds available, your child can create a large number of unique scenes. A clear voice-over reads the name of each item aloud, and is accompanied by fun animations and sound effects where possible. Make a Scene recreates the popular ‘fuzzy felts’ and sticker books in an interactive digital product.

This is a limited functionality version of the app. For more stickers and features check out what’s available in the full version:

Key features:
Over 40 ‘stickers’ to use across 5 different backgrounds allowing endless scene possibilities
Save scene as an image to your device
Multi touch enabled
Automatic flip
Automatic depth of field
Easy-to-use toolbar and menus
Descriptive audio
Engaging animations
Sound effects 
Background sounds to bring the experience to life
Ability to move and re-arrange ‘stickers’
Ability to remove individual ‘stickers’ or reset all ‘stickers’ and position them once again
versionNote:
Bug fixes
Added automatic direction based flip
Updated icon
